# 雙重疊代

## iterativeXy.js

```
PS D:\ccc\ccc109\se\deno\alg\04-iterative\double> deno run iterativeXy.js
x= 1 y= 1
x= 1.7320508075688772 y= 1.0000000000000002
solution: x= 1.7320508075688772 y= 1.0000000000000002
```

## diterative1.js

初值為 10

```
PS D:\ccc\ccc109\se\deno\alg\04-iterative\double> deno run diterative1.js
x= 10
x= 50.5
x= 1275.625
x= 813610.0703125
x= 330980673257.45557
x= 5.477410303497928e+22
x= 1.500101181643263e+45
x= 1.125151777583757e+90
x= 6.329832612999442e+179
x= Infinity
x= Infinity
x= Infinity
x= Infinity
x= Infinity
```
